Articles.Content:
Ok - So I'm not totally sure if this is the correct place to ask the question, but I'm wondering if it's possible to use mechjeb to transfer from Mun/Minmus to other planets such as Duna. I've tried using advanced transfer and transfer but it's a no go. The target has to be within the gravitational influence of Kerbin. Am I missing another option or is it just not possible with the mod? Oh and yes I know I could do it manually... I'm just not there yet.

Thanks!

38 minutes ago, Hajii said:

Ok - So I'm not totally sure if this is the correct place to ask the question, but I'm wondering if it's possible to use mechjeb to transfer from Mun/Minmus to other planets such as Duna. I've tried using advanced transfer and transfer but it's a no go. The target has to be within the gravitational influence of Kerbin. Am I missing another option or is it just not possible with the mod? Oh and yes I know I could do it manually... I'm just not there yet.

Thanks!

Not as far as I know. 

You just need to leave the SOI of the moon first* so that you are orbiting Kerbin and then use advanced transfer.

*That's a trivial maneuver, just orbit until you are on the far side of the moon to Kerbin, point prograde and fire up the engines until your orbit goes hyperbolic.
If you're open to using other mods, Astrogator can handle such transfers.

25 minutes ago, HebaruSan said:

If you're open to using other mods, Astrogator can handle such transfers.

Thanks, I'll check it out!

2 hours ago, HebaruSan said:

If you're open to using other mods, Astrogator can handle such transfers.

Holy excrements! As a player who sucks at calculating these things on his own, this mod is amazing. Made a huge difference. Thank you so much!

Edited December 19, 2017 by Hajii
